summary: Michael Todd , byname Mike Todd, was an American theatre and movie producer.
full_text: Michael "Mike" Todd  was an American theater and film producer, best known for his 1956 production of Around the World in 80 Days, which won an Academy Award for Best Picture. He is known as the third of Elizabeth Taylor's seven husbands and is the only one whom she did not divorce. He was the driving force behind the development of the eponymous Todd-AO widescreen film format.
title: Mike Todd
